doc:
Michael Murphy (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Murphy_(actor) 0 Michael George Murphy (born May 5, 1938) is an American film, television and stage actor. He often plays unethical or morally ambiguous characters in positions of authority, including politicians, executives and lawyers. He is also known for his frequent collaborations with director Robert Altman, having appeared in twelve films, TV series and miniseries directed by Altman from 1963 to 2004, including the title role in the miniseries Tanner '88. Michael_George_Murphy ( born May_5_,_1938 ) is an_American_film_,_television_and_stage_actor .
